abstract: International news reports that Venezuelan military officer Leamsy Salazar has fled country and is cooperating with American narcotics investigators draws condemnation and accusations of conspiracy from Venezuelan government.
lead_paragraph: Venezuelan leaders respond to reports that an ex-chief of the security for the National Assembly leader has implicated him as a drug trafficker.
snippet: Venezuelan leaders respond to reports that an ex-chief of the security for the National Assembly leader has implicated him as a drug trafficker.

headline.main: Former Top Venezuela Aide Said to Flee Amid Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Former Top Venezuela Aide Said to Flee Amid Inquiry
